parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.72

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sensors

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns true if vehicle has active sensors on.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[isVehicleRadarOn]] vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - vehicle on which check is performed

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[isVehicleRadarOn ]] [[vehicle]] [[player]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns [[true]] if radar is turned on</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setVehicleRadar]]
</value></part></template></root>
